name: 2023 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and Signal Processing
content: Call for Papers for the 2023 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing (ICASSP) is now open! ICASSP 2023 will be held from June 4-9 in Rhodes Island, Greece. The ﬂagship conference of the IEEE Signal Processing Society will oﬀer a comprehensive technical program presenting all the latest developments in research and technology for signal processing and its applications. Featuring world-class oral and poster sessions, keynotes, plenaries and perspective talks, exhibitions, demonstrations, tutorials, short courses, and satellite workshops, it is expected to attract leading researchers and global industry ﬁgures, providing a great networking opportunity. Moreover, exceptional papers and contributors will be selected and recognized by ICASSP.
